items.sentence: I don\'t think that anyone has told Tom yet.
I don\'t think they could understand French.
I\'d rather you didn\'t, if you don\'t mind.
I\'ll never forget going to Hawaii with her.
Tom splashed Mary and she splashed him back.
Tom is the one who went to Boston with Mary.
I want to find out where Tom went last week.
Tom wants to go out to get something to eat.
Tom wants to know the cause of the accident.
Tom knows that you\'ve spent time in prison.
I almost dropped my cellphone into the pool.
Tom isn\'t handling the situation very well.
To tell the truth, I didn\'t do my homework.
My father usually goes to his office by bus.
What\'s the best gift you\'ve ever received?
Tom doesn\'t have to go to Boston next week.
What did you watch on television last night?
What do you want me to tell Tom if he calls?
I have no problem with my short-term memory.
I have to find out where Tom went yesterday.
